item.title: Senate to vote again on government funding bills as shutdown reaches 3rd day
item.description: With negotiations appearing stalled, the shutdown could go through the weekend.

item.title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs sentencing live updates: Hearing underway
item.description: Sean "Diddy" Combs will be sentenced on Friday after being found guilty of transportation to engage in prostitution.

item.title: Supreme Court to consider overturning Hawaii law regulating where guns can be carried
item.description: The Supreme Court says it will consider overturning a Hawaii law that imposes strict regulations on where people can carry guns

item.title: WATCH: College freshman lives out his dream of playing football at age 58
